query: ALTER TABLE user_api_token ADD CONSTRAINT user_api_token_pk PRIMARY KEY(token_id), ADD CONSTRAINT user_api_token_token_id_user_id_uk UNIQUE( token_id, user_id ), ADD CONSTRAINT user_api_token_token_id_user_id_login_type_fk FOREIGN KEY(token_id, user_id, login_type) REFERENCES user_login( login_id, user_id, login_type );
